A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILER ALERT!!! I wanted to like this movie but I found myself saying “wtf” and just getting frustrated with all the characters and their horrible decisions costing everyone to die. There weren’t any exciting moments\, just a lot of let downs and repetitiveness. The character\, Poe\, is so careless\, wreckless\, and caused everyone to die with his stupid decisions to go against the admiral. If only the admiral had told Poe the plan\, they could of saved so many lives. So many bad one liners\, bad screenplay\, bad directing\, bad sound mixing\, bad cinematography\, bad fight scenes\, and bad everything. I hope they can make a better Star Wars movie in the future. 1/5 star for me.
